entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as setting off to find seats on the train with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as setting off to find seats on the train with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as setting off to find seats on the train with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is a pet owl of one of the characters, but it's not specified which character. It is mentioned as becoming noisier in response to the hooting of many owls through the mist.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is a member of the Weasley family and is mentioned as saying goodbye to Ginny. He hints that he might be seeing his friends sooner than they think, but doesn't explain why.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a member of the Weasley family and is mentioned as asking Charlie why he thinks he might be seeing his friends sooner than they think.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a member of the Weasley family and is mentioned as someone that Charlie doesn't want to tell about his classified information.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a member of the Weasley family and is mentioned as saying goodbye to Harry, Ron, and Hermione on the platform.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a member of the Weasley family and is mentioned as saying goodbye to Harry, Ron, and Hermione on the platform.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a member of the Weasley family and is mentioned as being hugged goodbye by Charlie.
